name: Treat or Retreat
description:
Trick or treating is a dangerous activity to do when a monster is chasing after you!

Collect candies and give them to the monster behind you or it might take YOU for a treat! 

Use arrow keys to play.  

Programming: Ogofkop

Art: PtitWazo

Game Idea: Ogofkop, PtitWazo, TooTiredToName 

original platformer game: https://microstudio.dev/i/microstudio/coronahunt/

original asprin game: https://microstudio.dev/i/matth/asprin/
